item.title: Cluster Analysis in Theory
item.description: body { text-align: justify} This article is a summary of the StatQuest video made by Josh Starmer. Click here to see the video on K-Mean explained by Josh Starmer. Click here to see the video on Hierarchical Clustering explained by Josh Starmer. Cluster analysis or clustering is the task of grouping a set of objects in such a way that objects in the same group (called a cluster) are more similar (in some sense) to each other than to those in other groups (clusters).
